entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to a few flurries near noon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 30 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
